meanings.definition: The quality of being self-assertive or proud to an irritating degree.
meanings.sent1: Her bumptiousnesses made it hard for others to work with her.
meanings.sent2: His bumptiousnesses often rubbed his classmates the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bumptiousnesses, he was still well-liked by many.
meanings.sent4: The bumptiousnesses of the peacock as it strutted around the farm was quite comical.
meanings.sent5: The bumptiousnesses of the lion as it roared in the jungle could be heard for miles.

meanings.definition: An instance of behaving in a self-assertive or proud manner.
meanings.sent1: The teacher had to address the student's bumptiousnesses in class.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, his bumptiousnesses were on full display.
meanings.sent3: His bumptiousnesses at the party were met with eye-rolls from the guests.
meanings.sent4: The bumptiousnesses of the toddler as he demanded more cookies were adorable.
meanings.sent5: The bumptiousnesses of the politician during the debate turned off many voters.
